Passage: Andrzej Sebastian Duda (Polish pronunciation: [ˈandʐɛjˈduda](listen); born 16 May 1972) is a Polish politician who serves as the sixth and current President of Poland, holding the office since 6 August 2015.[3] Before his tenure as President, Duda was a member of Polish Lower House (Sejm) from 2011 to 2014 and the European Parliament from 2014 to 2015.[4] Question: Who is the current president of Poland? summary: Andrzej Sebastian Duda (Polish pronunciation: [ˈandʐɛjˈduda](listen); born 16 May 1972) is a Polish politician who serves as the sixth and current President of Poland, holding the office since 6 August 2015.[3] Before his tenure as President, Duda was a member of Polish Lower House (Sejm) from 2011 to 2014 and the European Parliament from 2014 to 2015.[4]
question: Who is the current president of Poland?
